text: Yves de Wasseige (13 May 1926 â€“ 2 August 2021) was a Belgian politician and economist. He was born in Auvelais, Belgium. He was a member of the Socialist Party. Wasseige was a member of the Senate of Belgium from 1979 until 1991. Wasseige died on 2 August 2021 in Marcinelle, Belgium at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian politicians Category:Belgian economists
title: Yves de Wasseige
